entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
